thread.title: Hakeem Mabinuori
thread.title_full: eUKhost Ltd reviewed by Hakeem Mabinuori

author: Hakeem Mabinuori
title: Hakeem Mabinuori
text:
Jason was fantastic in helping me to navigate and narrow down my choices as to which hosting plan to go for. All questions were answered professionally and what the customer needed was of most importance rather than what eUK Host wanted to sell.
Keep up the good work on eliciting customer needs and proposing the most appropriate plan.
